author: rekovic
body:
10 3 X PR (contains more then https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24752)

-Swap out chunky sandwich for jet phi ring subtraction
-Update eg eta restriction
-Update centrality classes
-Update centrality saturation handling
title: Pr103x L1T update centrality,  saturation fixes, EG eta restriction, jetphi ring subtraction
